issue.title: [tiny] Core issue 1564, Template argument deduction from an initializer list

discussion.p: Discussed in Rapperswil 2014. EWG points out that auto deduction is moving to the opposite direction, and there's a reason why the suggested deduction isn't done, Vandevoorde showed an example of an overload set including an unconstrained template and a function taking a vector, and explained that the rules currently choose the function taking a vector, and advised against changing that. Closing as NAD.
